Data for Gregg and Carder sky irradiance model as extended to 800 nm for Hydrolight 4.0
Extraterrestrial solar irrad Fobar (W/cm2 um) is from Neckel & Labs for 701-801 nm
Ozone abs coef a_O3 (1/cm) is linearly interpolated from 10 nm band averages for 701-801
Oxygen a_O2 and water vapor a_H2O abs coefs (1/cm) are from modtran
wavel Fobar a_O3 a_O2 a_H2O
